stories.text:
…and for what purpose?

Just curious about user behaviours in large online communities. Personally I rarely use them, for no particular reason, just never had a real need.

Curious what everyone else thinks.

stories.text:
My note taking is all over the place, unstructured, random, but most frequently non-existent. I'd really like to get better at this.

I was wondering if perhaps people would be willing to share their notes from a typical work day which may help to provide some insight into what effective note taking actually looks like.
stories.title: Ask HN: Could you share the notes you took on a typical work day?
